it.polimi.ingsw.model.exceptions.ResourceException

Packages that use ResourceException
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.model.resource  

  • Uses of ResourceException in it.polimi.ingsw.model.resource

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.model.resource that throw ResourceException
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ResourceHandler.addAdditionalDeposit​(Resource type)
    This method adds an additional deposit checking that there weren't already two created or that exists already one with that resource
    void ResourceHandler.newAdditionalDepositState​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> received)
    This method accept new additional deposits state checking that they're not full and that the material is compatible with the type of the deposit
    void ResourceHandler.newDepositState​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> new_state)
    This method grants to the user the ability to modify the deposit state
    void Strongbox.returnMaterials​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> required)  
    void ResourceHandler.takeMaterials​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> taken)
    This method removes a certain quantity of materials, firstly from the additional deposit, then from the deposit and lastly from the strongbox
